content: right brain crochet 1 kanata kerchief tank sample is size s/m completed with vickie howell cotton-ish in lemon twist materials 6 0 mm crochet hook us 10/j approximately 775 900 yards dk weight yarn tapestry needle blocking materials optional sizes women s size s/m and l/xl see customization notes after row 4 for details on altering size for a custom fit construction this tank is constructed with four identical squares which are seamed together upon completion the straps and edging are worked into the garment © 2017 right brain crochet www facebook com/rightbraincrochet/ right brain crochet@gmail com right brain crochet 2 gauge gauge is not vital for this project squares are constructed to measurements so you can add or subtract any even number of row to achieve the size with whichever hook best suits for yarn gauge in sample in photographs row 1-3 after blocking = 4 x 4 10 cm x 10 cm square abbreviations used st = stitch skip = skip chain = chain sl-st = slip-stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet important notes before beginning each initial chain-3 counts as a double_crochet each chain-1 + single_crochet in corner counts as chain-2 each corner contains a shell 2dc + 2 chain + 2dc the first chain-3 + double_crochet in any row count as the first 2 double_crochet in the first shell and the last 2 double_crochet in that row count as the last 2 double_crochet of the same shell instead of a chain-2 between the two groups of double_crochet a chain-1 then a single_crochet into the 3rd chain of the beginning chain-3 is made this creates the equivalent of a chain-2 but puts you in the middle of chain © 2017 right brain crochet www facebook com/rightbraincrochet/ right brain crochet@gmail com right brain crochet 3 reduced stitch pattern kanata kerchief tank do not turn at the end of row stitch counts are indicated at the end of row in curly braces square make 4 row 1 create a magic_ring or chain-4 sl-st in first chain to form a ring in ring chain-3 counts as double_crochet here and throughout 2dc chain-2 3dc in ring three times chain-1 single_crochet in 3rd chain of initial chain-3 counts as chain-2 here and
